attributes.title: Scary Cheeto man

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!
attributes.review: when i got this app, it asked for my addres, and i would do anything for MY president so i  typed it in. it asked for my gender (female) and i gave it, but then a BIG SWEATY WHITE MAN came to my house and forced his way in, hurting my poor grandma in the process. he then PROCEEDED to PUSH my grandma out of a window, and teabag me while screaming TRUMP 2020. i am SHOCKED and OUTRAGED! i will not be supporting trump in the upcoming electon ANYMORE! my poor  meemaw is in the HOSPITAL NOW! i hate this app and i hate trump. KANYE FOR PRIESDENT!!!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
As soon as I downloaded it my private information was being stolen. The app was taking pictures without me using it. Then my bank told that app was using my money without MY CONSENT. That not the worst part I was sent DISGUSTING PICTURES OF A NAKED CHEETO THAT HAD A MICROSCOPIC PENIS. After that happened half the screen on my phone was BLACK OUT MEANING I COULDN'T SEE THE OTHER HALF OF MY SCREEN. I HAD TO BUY WHOLE NEW PHONE FOR $900. 

IN ALL I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THIS APP IF I COULD I WOULD GIVE THIS APP ZERO STARS

attributes.title: ive never been more terrified
attributes.review: this app is absolutely unsettling in many ways.  there were photos of the worst tanned man I have ever seen.  this is direct hate speech against minors and minorities of all sorts.  do not let anyone you know buy this app because not only is it awful to look at and read it installed malware on my phone leading to loss of sound and the ability to type capitol letters.
